doc.title: Zombees

credit.role: Phil the photographer - aka Zombee No.1

doc.plot: ZomBees is a surreal serendipity into the chaos of man's folly in genetic engineering and the Colony Collapse Disorder (C.C.D.) that is devastating the World's honeybee population. Man's childish grasp of science and it's arrogant tinkering with genetic engineering is to blame and ZomBees are the result. The issue of CCD is very real and this film explores the possible catastrophic results from blindly triggering an ecological imbalance that may some day soon doom us all.
